column4: anyone able to tell me the correct way to install grub i have 4 partitions  win 7 vista32 ubuntu  extra space when it goes to install grub i select sdb3 my ubuntu partition but the windows boot manager doesn't see it i tried to use EasyBCD but it fails to load ubuntu any thoughts?
does that mean i need to install grub to drive 0? the default or he first partition of sdb1?
grub is installed to the MBR of the drive you want bootable, the config will be in /boot
killall is the command, you can also use:  ps -ef | grep name    use the leftmost value as the PID and run:  kill PID
if you press ALT+F2 and run:  metacity --replace    yuo will be using metacity as the WM
and I ghave told you so, kindly read again
press ALT+F2 and run:  windowmanagername --replace     its how you switch WM... so the switching back method you already knew
So how you make it permenent :P
